page.title: 11EDUCATION-PLAYING PLACE/KEA
page.content: EDUCATION All children have to go to school between 5_16 years old. Tuition is free. They start{PRIMARY}schools at 5 years old.There are no{PRIMARY}schools in our area so the children go to Kea or Devoran schools. At 11 years children leave{PRIMARY} school to go to a {SECONDARY}school, usually PENAIR in Truro.There is a{ {PRIVATE SECONDARY}school at TREGYE (the DUTCHY).Children leave {SECONDARY school at 16 years. They may want to continue till 18 years old at RICHARD LANDER or the {SIXTH_FORM}centre in Truro. Young people may then choose to study at{CORNWALL}college or at a {UNIVERSITY}out of our COUNTY.
